WorkItem.Description:
Repro:

- Start the SimpleEditSample
- Select a node
- Press F2
- The following exception is thrown:
```
Unable to cast object of type 'System.Windows.Controls.EditTextBox' to type 'System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewExItem'.
   at System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingTreePanel.MakeVisible(Visual visual, Rect rectangle) in c:\Projects\External\TreeViewEx\Main\TreeViewEx\Controls\VirtualizingTreePanel.cs:line 428
```

Comments.Message:
Resolved with changeset 73149: Fix for 24768
Now Editing is stoped correctly, if another item is selected
